titles.title: CB 162 From Glory to Glory He's Changing Me
II Corinthians 3:18

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
FROM GLORY TO GLORY HEâ€™S CHANGING
ME,
Changing me, changing me. His likeness and
image to perfect in me; the love of God shown to
the world.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For He's changing, changing me, from earthly
things to the heavenly; His likeness and image to
perfect in me; the love of God shown to the world.
